Articles.Content:
Hi! Ever start up KSP and not think of anything to do?

Well i've come up with a solution to fix this!

By filling out this form over and over again:

SOI:

Mission Type:

Return:

, we can never be bored in KSP again!

I will begin:

SOI:Minmus

Mission Type: Manned Orbiter

Return: Yes

Now let's see YOU make a random mission!

I'll give it a go

SOI: Moho

Mission: Modular Surface Base

Return: I dare ya

Edited June 18, 2014 by SofusRud

SOI: Sun

Mission Type: Manned Landing

Return: Probably not
Somebody wrote a program for this sort of thing: http://kspmissiongenerator.webs.com/hard-missions

SOI: Jool

Mission Type: SSTO to Jool's "surface" and back

Return: Become Scott Manley, then try

SOI: Sun

Mission Type: Manned Landing

Return: Probably not

Beat me to it!
This probably won't be a problem when contracts are added. It's not a problem for me right now anyway, but maybe it is for long term players.

Somebody wrote a program for this sort of thing: http://kspmissiongenerator.webs.com/hard-missions

I've just had a look at that. When it says "hard missions", it's not kidding - it suggested I do a Grand Tour in an unmanned spaceplane including atmospheric polar flights everywhere with an atmosphere, with no fuel lines or debris.

SOI: Kerbin

Mission type: manned landing

Return: yes

Such a hard mission!! Technically an EVA kerbal jump counts.
Manned SSTO to Eeloo and return.
Unmanned Lander with sample return

Mission: Jool

Obgective: Build a base that can support 50 Kerbals on Jool's surface.

Return: Good luck.

SOI: None/Interstellar Space

Type: 100-Kerbal Starship

Return: Of course not!

Yeah, I'm aware this isn't possible but still...

I think the "Extra requirement" thing is needed to make this interesting.

SOI: Laythe

Mission Type: Lander

Return: Yes

Requirement: Water landing

SOI: None/Interstellar Space

Type: 100-Kerbal Starship

Return: Of course not!

Yeah, I'm aware this isn't possible but still...

I want to attempt this now I need to hurry up and build my new rig!

I want to attempt this now I need to hurry up and build my new rig!
IIRC something like it was the last Reddit weekly challenge.

Mission: Laythe

Mission Type: Colonization + City Making.

Return: Ferries.... 'nuff said.

Mission: Duna

Mission Type: Manned, Atmospheric Craft, Circumnavigation

Return: Go ahead and Try.

Other Parameters: Circumnavigation does not mean orbiting, it means flying the atmosphere.

Modder's Trial: Do so with Firespitter Propellers as your means of atmospheric Propulsion.

SOI-1: Eeloo

SOI-2: Moho

Mission: Manned flight from SOI-1 to SOI-2 or viceversa.

Return: no need to. You already won KSP.

SOI: Kerbin

Mission Type: Speed - max Apo: 10.000 - go over Mach 4

Return: optional on KSC
